name: esp-lowcode-matter-v0.6
onCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget flex bison gperf cmake ninja-build ccache libffi-dev libssl-dev dfu-util libusb-1.0-0 libcairo2-dev
postCreateCommand: cd /workspace && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/espressif/esp-idf.git -b release/v5.3 && cd esp-idf && git submodule update --init && ./install.sh
cd /workspace && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/chiragatal/esp-amp.git -b main && cd esp-amp && export ESP_AMP_PATH=/workspace/esp-amp
